label: originCountry
comment: A country of origin for this supply chain consignment.
A country of origin for this trade product.
The country of origin where this supply chain consignment item has been produced.

rangeIncludes.comment: The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
